title: Remove automatic git committing functionality
description: Remove git.ts, git.test.ts, and related dependencies. Horizon should not automatically commit changes - leave that to the user.
notes: Successfully removed all automatic git committing functionality. Removed git.ts, git.test.ts, GitService interface and implementation, removed simple-git dependency, updated all imports and container bindings, removed git commit calls from CLI commands, updated all tests to pass without git functionality.
